name: Pixelated
description:
Pixelated is a single-player adventure platformer. In the game, you have to parkour through each 5 levels but not die. There will be obstacles to block you, and you have to use your logic and skill to escape.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, [R] to restart and level, [N] to skip a level, [B] to go back to the previous level.

Thanks for playing!
